QuestData.Title: Journey to Orgrimmar
QuestData.Description: A messenger just asked me to pass along an invitation. It is from the priest trainer, Martin Goodchilde, at The Barracks in Orgrimmar.$B$BHe asks that you meet with him at your soonest convenience. The Barracks can be found within the Valley of Honor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Martin Goodchilde at The Barracks in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Martin Goodchilde at The Barracks in Orgrimmar.
